page.title: 10A DAY IN MY LIFE.
page.content: I am a ten year old girl. I live in the village of Carharrack. My home is a bungalow. I get up every morning at eight o'clock and have breakfast in the kitchen. I leave home at half past eight to go to the primary school at St.Day. When I get to school I meet some of my friends in the playground. After registration we take our hymn books into the Hall for Assembly. There are 250 children in our school _150 Juniors and 100 Infants. A Maths lesson follows and then it's playtime for 15 minutes which we call tuck playtime.Work continues with English lessons until lunchtime when I have a packed lunch.Then there are more lessons until school finishes at 3.20p.m.I have my tea at 5 o'clock and then go out to play until 7 o'clock. I have my supper and read before going to sleep.
